successes.title: WakaWaka Base: a Power & Light First Aid Kit
successes.description: Compact portable solar power kit. A single day of sunlight is enough for multiple phone charges or an entire week of light.

Pledges.description: AGENT OF LIGHT: And for this we thank you! You will get exclusive reports on what happens next and a mention at waka-waka.com as an Agent of Light.

WAKA WAKA BABY: You get a bright yellow 4GB WakaWaka shaped USB stick, with a special thank you video message on it. We will also include an Agent Of Light t-shirt and mention you on waka-waka.com as an Agent of Light.

[EXCLUSIVE] WakaWaka & Waka Flocka Flame SHOUTOUT. You get: Waka Flocka Flame shoutout on Twitter thanking fans for their contribution and you get a bright yellow 4GB WakaWaka shaped USB stick, with a special thank you video message on it from the founders. We will also include an Agent Of Light t-shirt and mention you on waka-waka.com as an Agent of Light.

POWER TO YOU: All of the above PLUS a WakaWaka Power+. Our compact solar charger and light in one. Comes with more easy accessible USB ports and better software than its predecessor. Ready to ship so you'll have it in time for the holidays!                                          [we might need to charge more than $20 for shipping to exotic locations]

SUPER EARLY BIRD: Base 5, your own Power & Light First Aid Kit. 5,000 mAh of portable power, a 7.5W super efficient solar panel, 2 LED lights and a rugged pouch to store all this gear. An all-in-one solar solution with enough juice for multiple smart phone charges or an entire week of light - perfect for commuting or outdoor use! [we might need to charge more than $25 for shipping to exotic locations]

MORE SUPER EARLY BIRD: Base 5 [Wow! What an incredible response!] Your own Power & Light First Aid Kit. 5,000 mAh of portable power, a 7.5W super efficient solar panel, 2 LED lights and a rugged pouch to store all this gear. An all-in-one solar solution with enough juice for multiple smart phone charges or an entire week of light - perfect for commuting or outdoor use! [we might need to charge more than $25 for shipping to exotic locations]

[NEW] BASE 5 - SUPERCHARGE: Upgrade your Base 5 solar panel from 7.5W (6V) to 10W (8V). You get: 5,000 mAh of portable power, a 10W super efficient solar panel, 2 LED lights and a rugged pouch to store all this gear.

EARLY ADOPTER: Base 5, your own Power & Light First Aid Kit. 5,000 mAh of portable power, a 7.5W super efficient solar panel, 2 LED lights and a rugged pouch to store all this gear. An all-in-one solar solution with enough juice for multiple smart phone charges or an entire week of light - perfect for commuting or outdoor use! [we might need to charge more than $25 for shipping to exotic locations]

An all-in-one solar solution with enough juice for multiple smart phone charges or an entire week of light - a necessity for every home! An all-in-one solar solution with enough juice for multiple smart phone charges or an entire week of light - a necessity for every home! [we might need to charge more than $25 for shipping to exotic locations]
[NEW] a BUNDLE of BASE 5: Get 3 times the Base 5 and save $30! 5,000 mAh of portable power, a 7.5W super efficient solar panel, 2 LED lights and a rugged pouch to store all this gear.
[NEW] a BUNDLE of BASE 10: Get 3 times the Base 10 and save $30! 10,000 mAh of portable power, a 10W super efficient solar panel, 2 LED lights and a rugged pouch to store all this gear.

[EXCLUSIVE] WakaWaka & Waka Flocka Flame WAKE UP/SKYPE CALL. You get: Skype Call and/or Wake Up Call from Waka Flocka Flame + Get 3 times the Base 10 - 10,000 mAh of portable power, a 10W super efficient solar panel, 2 LED lights and a rugged pouch to store all this gear.
[NEW] SUPER BACKER 10 x BASE 10: you save $140! and get 10 complete sets of the BASE 10 with the 10W solar panel and 2 LED lights in the rugged pouch.

[EXCLUSIVE] WakaWaka & Waka Flocka Flame MEET & GREET! You get: 2 Economy Flights in Continental US & 2 Nights Hotel Stay + 2 Tickets to Waka Flocka Performance in New York on November 21st + Meet & Greet + Wake-Up Call. And get 10x BASE 10 Sets.

[EXCLUSIVE] WakaWaka & Waka Flocka Flame VIDEO SHOOT! You get: Attendance at  Waka Flocka Flame Video Shoot in US in 2015 + 2 Economy Flights in Continental US & 2 Nights Hotel Stay + Meet & Greet. And you choose what you get: 15 x WakaWaka Power+ as well as 15 x BASE 10, or a mix.
We will contact you right away.
